    应力导向的3D打印楼盖系统——南京汤山矿坑公园展览馆设计
    Stress-oriented 3D printing floor system - Design of the Nanjing Tangshan Mine Park Exhibition Hall.

    2021 Nanjing, Jiangsu, China

    This graduation project applies a 3D printing construction system to the design of the exhibition hall in Nanjing Tangshan Mine Park, creating a unique flowing space and lighting environment that showcases the superiority of this construction system.
    矾灵灯彩
    Latterns of Montain Fan

    2022 Nanjing, Jiangsu, China

    The concept draws inspiration from the composition of feldspar crystals, combines traditional Qinhuai lanterns, and integrates computational design and CNC construction methods to research and solve problems related to structural construction, node assembly, and material performance.
    with by He Siyuan
